attributes.action: Pay a cash bonus to all health care workers.
attributes.additional_details: Pay a bonus equivalent to the money being given to all those people on furlough from their work. That is £2500 a month until the furlough is lifted.
attributes.background: I want the government to pay a cash bonus to all our health care heroes. It must surely be the right and decent thing to do as these workers are literally risking their lives for us at this extremely difficult time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one or more of these petitions instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619
